text: At 3 years, the reported OS was $8 \%$ .Local and distant relapses were seen in $7 5 \%$ and $3 3 \%$ of the women, respectively (Table 42).It should be noted that (1) 40 of these patients did not receive external-beam radiation therapy and 37 of them had gross residual tumour and (2) the results documented may be a reflection of inclusion of all patients without selecting for tumour volume and site of recurrence.

response: 根据研究数据，3年总生存率为8%。局部复发的比例为75%，远处复发的比例为33%。此外，这些结果可能受到多种因素的影响，例如是否接受外照射放疗、肿瘤残余的情况（例如是否存在明显残留肿瘤）、研究中是否对肿瘤体积或复发部位进行了选择等。 这些都可能影响研究结论的可靠性和适用性。
